item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Anurag, a backend developer and homelab enthusiast. The vast majority of my work is free and open-source on GitHub. Moreover, I’m founder of @hackclubnmit and love building softwares, automating my workflows, self-hosting all my services on custom build personal servers (Raspberry Pi clusters with ICE Tower Cooler), developing algo-trading scripts, managing my entire life on Notion and reading a lot of newsletters on system design choices of big tech. From design to development I love the entire process of building software.
